duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the day to day operations of the Public Sector renewals team.
Motivate and manage a team of individual contributors to drive pipeline development and revenues through sales efforts leveraging the partner network.
Accurately forecast and drive a committed number on a weekly, monthly, and quarterly basis.
Supervise and close deals (large and small) through to completion.
Develop metrics and reporting, by gathering the needs of management and delivering useful reports.
Coordinate, direct, and monitor the outbound efforts of assigned Renewals teams by tracking and reporting weekly activities.
Collaborate with business leaders to identify strategies to achieve sales goals and uncover new, high-value opportunities.
Provide accurate, ongoing reporting through the continuous update and maintenance of necessary reports in Salesforce.com.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
